svg.style: background: transparent; background-color: transparent; color-scheme: light dark;

path.style: fill: light-dark(#ffffff, var(--ge-dark-color, #121212)); stroke: light-dark(rgb(0, 0, 0), rgb(255, 255, 255));

rect.style: fill: light-dark(rgb(255, 230, 204), rgb(54, 33, 10)); stroke: light-dark(rgb(215, 155, 0), rgb(153, 101, 0));

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe flex-start; width: 318px; height: 1px; padding-top: 80px; margin-left: 52px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0; text-align: left; color: #000000;
display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: Helvetica; color: light-dark(#000000, #ffffff); line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; white-space: normal; word-wrap: normal;

rect.style: fill: light-dark(rgb(218, 232, 252), rgb(29, 41, 59)); stroke: light-dark(rgb(108, 142, 191), rgb(92, 121, 163));

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe flex-start; width: 318px; height: 1px; padding-top: 220px; margin-left: 52px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0; text-align: left; color: #000000;
display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: Helvetica; color: light-dark(#000000, #ffffff); line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; white-space: normal; word-wrap: normal;

div.div:
2. PWM Web App (pwm.fries.htb)
LDAP injection
Extract svc_infra credentials

rect.style: fill: light-dark(rgb(213, 232, 212), rgb(31, 47, 30)); stroke: light-dark(rgb(130, 179, 102), rgb(68, 110, 44));

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe flex-start; width: 318px; height: 1px; padding-top: 350px; margin-left: 52px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0; text-align: left; color: #000000;
display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: Helvetica; color: light-dark(#000000, #ffffff); line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; white-space: normal; word-wrap: normal;

div.div:
3. Active Directory (FRIES.HTB)
Read secrets stored in LDAP
Retrieve PostgreSQL credentials

rect.style: fill: light-dark(rgb(255, 242, 204), rgb(40, 29, 0)); stroke: light-dark(rgb(214, 182, 86), rgb(109, 81, 0));

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe flex-start; width: 318px; height: 1px; padding-top: 490px; margin-left: 52px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0; text-align: left; color: #000000;
display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: Helvetica; color: light-dark(#000000, #ffffff); line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; white-space: normal; word-wrap: normal;

div.div:
4. PostgreSQL Container (172.18.0.x)
SQL → RCE → reverse shell
First foothold inside Docker network

rect.style: fill: light-dark(rgb(248, 206, 204), rgb(81, 45, 43)); stroke: light-dark(rgb(184, 84, 80), rgb(215, 129, 126));

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe flex-start; width: 318px; height: 1px; padding-top: 655px; margin-left: 52px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0; text-align: left; color: #000000;
display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: Helvetica; color: light-dark(#000000, #ffffff); line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; white-space: normal; word-wrap: normal;
